# Alice Millikan Cox (1864-1926) - Married Owen Dudley Cox (1861-1894)

  - Daughter Carrie Cox Bell
  - Daughter Estella - Died of diptheria.

Alice Millikan Cox's husband died when she was 30 years old.  This left her with a daughter (Carrie), to raise on her own.  She moved with Carrie to Traverse City, Michigan. Traverse City was on the train line and would allow Carrid to attend high school.  Alice worked as a seamstress.  Once Carrie graduated from high school, they return to Indiana and Carrie attended nursing school at Providence Hospital in Indianapolis.
